Summary: Flash of blue light lit up sky, then shot out towards ocean and left a green trail that stayed in the sky before disipating
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving south on I-95 toward home, the sky lit up blue, I thought a transformer blew i until I looked up and saw this thing take off towards the ocean. When It took of it left an enormous green trail that stayed in the sky for about ten seconds after it was gone, before it disipated.
trends: There have been 37 other sightings in Fort Lauderdale
There were no other sightings in Fort Lauderdale on or around August 1st 2011
